name: pi-rlm
description: Recursive Language Model extension for pi

scripts.check:full: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.typecheck: bash -lc 'out=$(tsc --noEmit src/rlm-engine.ts src/index.ts 2>&1 || true); filtered=$(echo "$out" | grep -v "Cannot find module" || true); if [ -n "$filtered" ]; then echo "$filtered"; exit 1; fi'
